result.eng: It was the Normans who started the habit of shaving beards and cutting hair.
result.ga: B'iad na Normannaigh a thosaigh an nós féasóg a bhearradh agus gruaig a ghearradh
result.orig: B'iad na Normannaigh a thosaigh an nós féasóg a bhearradh agus gruaig a ghearradh

result.eng: They threatened them with guns.

result.eng: He would be failing himself if he abandoned them now.

result.eng: He visited his children, all of them married by that time.

result.eng: They act as if they owned the place.

result.eng: The Polish are the most numerous immigant group to Ireland. This is so because of the high population of Poland.
result.ga: Is iad na Polannaigh an dream is mó inimirce go hÉirinn Tá sé sin amhlaidh toisc a mhéad atá daonra na Polainne
result.orig: Is iad na Polannaigh an dream is mó inimirce go hÉirinn Tá sé sin amhlaidh toisc a mhéad atá daonra na Polainne
result.html: Is iad na Polannaigh an dream is mó inimirce go hÉirinn Tá sé sin amhlaidh toisc a mhéad atá daonra na PolainneThe Polish are the most numerous immigant group to Ireland. This is so because of the high population of Poland.
result.ponchtml: Is iad na Polannaiġ an dream is mó inimirce go hÉirinn Tá sé sin aṁlaiḋ toisc a ṁéad atá daonra na PolainneThe Polish are the most numerous immigant group to Ireland. This is so because of the high population of Poland.

result.eng: These aren't friends, they're false friends.

result.eng: They thanked God for saving them from the danger.

result.eng: There were people there, I heard them shouting, but I wasn't able to touch them.

result.eng: He had the courage to wear t-shirts that were so tight you'd worry his nipples would pierce them.
result.ga: Bhí sé de mhisneach aige t-léinte a chaitheamh a bhí chomh teann sin go mbeadh eagla ort go bpollfadh a dhidíní iad
result.orig: Bhí sé de mhisneach aige t-léinte a chaitheamh a bhí chomh teann sin go mbeadh eagla ort go bpollfadh a dhidíní iad
result.html: Bhí sé de mhisneach aige t-léinte a chaitheamh a bhí chomh teann sin go mbeadh eagla ort go bpollfadh a dhidíní iadHe had the courage to wear t-shirts that were so tight you'd worry his nipples would pierce them.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé de ṁisneaċ aige t-léinte a ċaiṫeaṁ a ḃí ċoṁ teann sin go mbeaḋ eagla ort go bpollfaḋ a ḋidíní iadHe had the courage to wear t-shirts that were so tight you'd worry his nipples would pierce them.

result.eng: The first that people though of was terrorism, until it transpired that the thing [the earthquake] has seismic causes.
result.ga: B'é scéimhlitheoireacht an chéad rud a rith le daoine sular tháinig deimhniú gurbh iad cúinsí seismeacha ba chúis leis an rud
result.orig: B'é scéimhlitheoireacht an chéad rud a rith le daoine sular tháinig deimhniú gurbh iad cúinsí seismeacha ba chúis leis an rud
result.html: B'é scéimhlitheoireacht an chéad rud a rith le daoine sular tháinig deimhniú gurbh iad cúinsí seismeacha ba chúis leis an rudThe first that people though of was terrorism, until it transpired that the thing [the earthquake] has seismic causes.
result.ponchtml: B'é scéiṁliṫeoireaċt an ċéad rud a riṫ le daoine sular ṫáinig deiṁniú gurḃ iad cúinsí seismeaċa ba ċúis leis an rudThe first that people though of was terrorism, until it transpired that the thing [the earthquake] has seismic causes.

result.eng: Readers and listeners did not have to be consumers of news anymore but producers who were able to collect their own reports.
result.ga: Níor ghá gur thomhaltóirí nuachta iad an lucht léitheoireachta nó éisteachta a thuilleadh ach táirgeoirí a bheadh in inmhe a gcuid tuairiscí féin a bhailiú
result.orig: Níor ghá gur thomhaltóirí nuachta iad an lucht léitheoireachta nó éisteachta a thuilleadh ach táirgeoirí a bheadh in inmhe a gcuid tuairiscí féin a bhailiú
result.html: Níor ghá gur thomhaltóirí nuachta iad an lucht léitheoireachta nó éisteachta a thuilleadh ach táirgeoirí a bheadh in inmhe a gcuid tuairiscí féin a bhailiúReaders and listeners did not have to be consumers of news anymore but producers who were able to collect their own reports.
result.ponchtml: Níor ġá gur ṫoṁaltóirí nuaċta iad an luċt léiṫeoireaċta nó éisteaċta a ṫuilleaḋ aċ táirgeoirí a ḃeaḋ in inṁe a gcuid tuairiscí féin a ḃailiúReaders and listeners did not have to be consumers of news anymore but producers who were able to collect their own reports.

result.eng: From this time onward, most black people seen in Europe and the new world were slaves.
result.ga: As an am seo amach b'iad sclábhaithe formhór mór na ndaoine gorma a facthas san Eoraip agus sa domhan nua
result.orig: As an am seo amach b'iad sclábhaithe formhór mór na ndaoine gorma a facthas san Eoraip agus sa domhan nua
result.html: As an am seo amach b'iad sclábhaithe formhór mór na ndaoine gorma a facthas san Eoraip agus sa domhan nuaFrom this time onward, most black people seen in Europe and the new world were slaves.
result.ponchtml: As an am seo amaċ b'iad scláḃaiṫe forṁór mór na ndaoine gorma a facṫas san Eoraip agus sa doṁan nuaFrom this time onward, most black people seen in Europe and the new world were slaves.

result.eng: If he has a big house and good clothes, he should be thankful for them.
